title: [$250] [Explain feature] Add support for the "Explain" button in the front end

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: NewFeature
labels.description: Something to build that is a new item.

type.name: Feature
type.description: A request, idea, or new functionality

body:
# Part of the "Explain Concierge AI actions" project Main issue: https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/567869 # Feature Description - For this feature we need to implement an "Explain" button in the frontend for **any report action** that has a `reasoning` field. - This button will exist in the right-click menu for now - To start it will be visible on the following report actions: - Concierge auto-categorized something using AI - Concierge auto-submitted a report - Not shown in mockup: When the user taps explain we will create a comment thread off of the system message - There should be a comment from the user's perspective that says: "Please explain this to me." - Concierge should then respond with reason. **BE Changes are in development now.**

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.86-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** Exploratory around https://github.com/Expensify/Expensify/issues/579524 - The user is blocked with an important flow **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+ccardfeed@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Exploratory - Critical User Impact **Device used:** Samsung s10/ Android 12 **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: 1. Open Hybrid app 2. Log in using applausetester+ccardfeed@applause.expensifail.com 3. Go to Workspace > choose Company card tests- DO NOT DELETE (Default) 4. Go to Company cards 5. Scroll down to the bottom 6. Disable the internet connection ## Expected Result: The last company card should be fully visible and selectable both online and offline. ## Actual Result: The last company card is partially covered online and fully covered offline due to the lack of bottom margin, which makes the card unselectable. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/86dee68a-935b-4a36-8df4-a32416bd3394 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.86-1 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** N/A - new feature, doesn't exist in prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/13176706/test-cases/68947830 https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/77701 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** - **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Regression TC Execution **Device used:** MacOS Monterey 12.7.4 / Chrome **App Component:** Other **Slack conversation** (hyperlinked to channel name): [Expensify QA](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C9YU7BX5M/p1766452233047269) ## Action Performed: Preconditions: 1. User is an admin of a workspace with an active card feed. (Use plaid card feed) 2. The workspace has at least one unassigned card available. 3. The workspace has at least one other member invited to assign the card to. STR: 1. Navigate to Workspace Settings > Company Cards 2. Verify that cards are all listed and all columns are populated with data 3. Disable the internet connection on the device 4. Click the 'Assign card' button ## Expected Result: Button should be named 'Assign card' ## Actual Result: Button named 'Assign' ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

labels.name: External

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.86-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-2487/folder/13176877/41237352/1089918656 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+2230@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Exploratory - Critical User Impact **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 / Chrome ( mWeb / Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: Account has Self DM. Prerequisite 2: Account has a workspace with workflows disabled. 1. Open the staging.new.expensify.com website. 2. Create a manual expense and submit it to Self DM. 3. Tap on "Submit it to someone" option on whisper message. 4. Select a workspace and submit the expense to it. 5. Open the expense report. 6. Note that "Unexpected error submitting this expense" and "Unexpected error deleting this expenses" error messages appear on report. 7. Dismiss the errors. 8. Note that you are redirected back to chat, and report is now displayed empty. 9. Reopen report. 10. Note that infinite skeleton loader is displayed. 11. Tap on "More" 12. Note that there is no option to delete the empty report. 13. Tap on "Retract" 14. Note that no action is triggered. ## Expected Result: User should be able to submit a track expense to a workspace, even if workflows are disabled. ## Actual Result: "Unexpected error submitting this expenses" and "Unexpected error deleting this expenses" error messages appear at the same time when submitting a track expense to a workspace with workflows disabled. Also, when errors are dismissed, report displays infinite skeleton loader and it can´t be deleted or retracted. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/93dc0f3c-9e0d-45a2-b732-a8786c5963f3 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

Sign into a Beta enabled user that has validation on bank account disabled (Applausetester+en@applause.expensifail.com) 2. Go to WS 3. Tap Company Cards > Learn more > Finish setup 4. Tap on the back button ## Expected Result: Back button works and user can go back ## Actual Result: Nothing happens, the page freezes, even force closing the app does not fix the issue ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d5f706c9-80f8-488f-9893-1a4648bbf3cd https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ba412373-2c30-4bee-b0e9-70ec0e31bff7 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
